channel.title: The Mediaburn Radio Weblog
channel.description: "THE FOCUS OF DIGITAL MEDIA" - Gary Santoro and Mediaburn.net

item.title: Mediaburn Changes / Update
item.description:
Dear MRW Readers and Subscribers,

The Mediaburn Radio Weblog will be at this location for a limited, unspecified time.  To stay tuned to this overall frequency, please check http://twitter.com/Mediaburn or subscribe with RSS via http://twitter.com/statuses/user_timeline/2683031.rss

News will also be available on our flagship http://www.mediaburn.net and http://soulcircuit.ning.com

Thank you!

GS

P.S.  Gary Santoro's Guitar and Music is at http://starlight2000.tripod.com/guitar/ with the RSS 2.0 feed http://starlight2000.tripod.com/guitar/rss.xml

item.title: 'Kon-Tiki'
item.description: Last Kon-Tiki crew member dies at 92. OSLO - A museum official says Knut Magne Haugland, the last of six crew members who crossed the Pacific Ocean on board the balsa wood raft Kon-Tiki, has died. He was 92. [azcentral.com | thebuzz]

item.title: Source: Science Blog
item.description:
Sun and moon trigger deep tremors on San Andreas Fault. The faint tug of the sun and moon on the San Andreas Fault stimulates tremors deep underground, suggesting that the rock 15 miles below is lubricated with highly pressurized water that allows the...
[Science Blog]

item.title: Pretty Much Amazing!
item.description:
This Week's Touring News.

Photo by Red Dahlia

Calling this "This Week's Touring News" makes little sense since it's been a while since we've talked about new tour dates, but let's keep everything simple and uniform, shall we? Read on for new tour dates for Wilco, Kid Cudi, Yeasayer, Miike Snow, Neon Indian, The Antlers (with the Editors), The Big Pink (with A Place To Bury Strangers), Mos Def (with DOOM), Dan Black and Girl Talk.

Wilco

02-07 Missoula, MT [^] Adams Center *
02-09 Portland, OR [^] Arlene Schnitzer Hall *
02-10 Seattle, WA [^] Paramount Theatre *

item.title: MP3 Podcast: 'Castaways'
item.description:
MP3: Shearwater - Castaways.

MP3: Shearwater - Castaways

Can't wait for the new Shearwater album, due Feb. 23 on Matador. Rook was one of my favorites of '08.




[donewaiting.com]
